t: N&W Global Vending announces acquisition of Ducale macchine da caffè
s: January 6, 2022 - With this acquisition, N&W intends to strengthen its competitive position by increasing its current ranges of hot drink vending machines – which already include leading brands such as Necta, Saeco and Wittenborg – with models from the Ducale range.

t: N&W Global Vending And Cafection Sign Joint Venture | Vending Market Watch
s: N&W is the leading manufacturer in Europe of coffee, other hot and cold beverages and food vending machines with a particular focus on espresso coffee, and a rapidly developing presence in coffee machines for the OCS and food service segments.

t: N&W Global Vending Becomes EVOCA | Vending Market Watch
s: Andrea Zocchi, the chief executive officer of N&W Global Vending sent a message to customers recently informing them of a new focus and name change. "From today, N&W Global Vending S.p.A. (“N&W”) rebrands as EVOCA S.p.A (“EVOCA”)," indicated Zocchi in the annoucement.

t: N&W Global Vending S.p.A. - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
s: N&W Global Vending is a world leader in the production of automatic snack and beverage vending machines and is a major international player in both the HoReCa (hotel, restaurant and café) and the Office Coffee Services sectors.

N&W Global Vending | 7,754 followers on LinkedIn. N&W Global Vending is an internationally acclaimed vending machine manufacturer. From machine design, development, manufacture and distribution we offer an unrivalled service, backed by a wealth of expertise and a highly skilled workforce.

t: N&W GLOBAL VENDING FINALIZES THE ACQUISITION OF SAECO VENDING & PROFESSIONAL | Evoca Group

t: N&W Global Vending rebrands as EVOCA Group - European Vending and Coffee Service Association (EVA)
s: June 7, 2018 - New name is designed to strengthen position as a leading OCS and HORECA player. The new “EVOCA” name symbolises a commitment to innovation in 'EVO', that stands for Evolution, with the company’s Italian roots of the ‘espresso’ heritage with ‘CA’, that stands for Caffè.
